name: Linkwarden
description: A self-hosted, open-source collaborative bookmark manager to collect, organize, and preserve webpages.

NEXTAUTH_SECRET.description: A random 32+ character string for session security. Will be autogenerated by Heroku. Use value instead of generator for manual.

MEILI_HOST.description: Optional, but required for search. Sign up for a free Meilisearch Cloud project and paste the URL here.

MEILI_MASTER_KEY.description: Optional, but required for search. From your Meilisearch Cloud project, paste the 'Default Admin API Key' here.

CRON_SECRET.description: Optional. A secret key to protect the cron job endpoint that handles auto-backups and other scheduled tasks. Will be autogenerated by Heroku. Use value instead of generator for manual.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Optional. The number of concurrent web processes to run. Leave as default unless you know what you are doing.

MAX_REQUEST_SIZE.description: Optional. Maximum request size for incoming requests (e.g., '10mb').

LOG_LEVEL.description: Optional. Set the application log level.

scripts.postdeploy: heroku config:set NEXT_PUBLIC_HOST_URL=https://$(heroku apps:info -j | jq -r .app.name).herokuapp.com NEXTAUTH_URL=https://$(heroku apps:info -j | jq -r .app.name).herokuapp.com
